resources.string: Connect your ActiveLook smart glasses and display ride metrics in real-time on your glasses display.

What's New in Version 3.0:

 • Auto-reconnect during active rides
 • Configurable reconnect timeout (1-60 minutes)
 • Debug tab with display simulator
 • Improved UI with icon status indicators
 • Real-time data streaming to glasses

 Supported Metrics:
 • Speed, Heart Rate, Cadence
 • Power, Distance, Time
Tap the \"Connect glasses\" button to scan and pair your ActiveLook smart glasses.
The app will automatically reconnect to your glasses if they disconnect during a ride.
Configure the reconnect timeout in the Status tab (default: 10 minutes).
Continuously attempts to reconnect to glasses during active rides
Test your glasses display with simulated data
Enable logging for troubleshooting connection issues
